name: fanC
description: fanC is a project that connects creators, users, and social platforms based on both Web2 and Web3 technologies. Through fanC, social platforms enable mutual sharing between creators and users, allowing creators to truly own their content. Lastly, users can participate in platform operations and receive a portion of the profits. In this way, fanC will usher in a new era of social ai platforms through the interconnection of various participants, protection of creators' rights, and user engagement.
